Jun 30, 2005

War of the Donuts

Two things which I thought were true, but are not: * That JFK made a jelly donut of himself in Berlin. * That Orson Wells caused a panic in the tri-state area. Live and learn. (Via Language Hat and Crooked Timber respectively.) {berlin, donut, jfk, Kennedy, Orson Wells, war of the worlds}
